name: The Power is out - So is the Dino
name_original: The Power is out - So is the Dino
description:
This is a simple 2D Isometric game in which you control a dinosaur that freed itself from its cage and starts looking for visitors to devour.

You have 30 seconds to devour as many as you can, and each person you eat will give you additional time and speed.

This is not only the first isometric game I have worked on, but also the first I fully finish and release, as a participation in my first Game Jam.

I made the game from scratch by myself in 48 hours, I created all the art assets and own the rights to the music and sound effects.
